org.apache.streams.local.builders

Class LocalStreamBuilderTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.carrotsearch.randomizedtesting.RandomizedTest
      • org.apache.streams.local.builders.LocalStreamBuilderTest

  • public class LocalStreamBuilderTest
extends com.carrotsearch.randomizedtesting.RandomizedTest
    Basic Tests for the LocalStreamBuilder. Test are performed by redirecting system out and counting the number of lines that the SystemOutWriter prints to System.out. The SystemOutWriter also prints one line when cleanUp() is called, so this is why it tests for the numDatums +1.
